message.name: ERR_REQUEST_FV_COMMENTS_MUST_BE_LT_OR_EQ
message.locale: The Comment entered is too long (%1n), maximum allowed is %2n.

message.name: ERR_REQUEST_FV_REJECTIONREASON_MUST_BE_LT_OR_EQ
message.locale: The Rejection Reason entered is too long (%1n), maximum allowed is %2n.

message.name: ERR_REQUEST_FV_INVALID_STATUS_CHANGE_TO_SUBMITTED
message.locale: Request Status can only be changed to Submitted if status is previously Open. Request Status is currently %1c.

message.name: ERR_REQUEST_FV_INVALID_STATUS_CHANGE_TO_ACCEPTED
message.locale: Request Status can only be changed to Accepted if status is previously Submitted. Request Status is currently %1c.

message.name: ERR_REQUEST_FV_INVALID_STATUS_CHANGE_TO_REJECTED
message.locale: Request Status can only be changed to Rejected if status is previously Submitted. Request Status is currently %1c.

message.name: ERR_REQUEST_FV_INVALID_STATUS_CHANGE_TO_CANCELLED
message.locale: Request Status can only be changed to Canceled if status is previously Open. Request Status is currently %1c.
Request Status can only be changed to Cancelled if status is previously Open. Request Status is currently %1c.

message.name: ERR_REQUEST_XRV_INVALID_STATUS_OPEN_CHANGE_TO_CANCELLED
message.locale: This request is not 'Open', it cannot be canceled.
This request is not 'Open', it cannot be cancelled.

message.name: ERR_REQUEST_FV_SET_COMMENTS_STATUS_MUST_BE_OPEN
message.locale: Comments can only be modified while the request is '%1c'. This request is '%2c'.

message.name: ERR_REQUEST_FV_SOME_SEARCH_CRITERIA_MUST_BE_ENTERED
message.locale: You must specify some search criteria.
